title: Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher Workshops This summer the North Dakota Teacher Resource Coalition (NDTRC) is offering a teacher institute (for 2 graduate credits from UND, NDSU, or MSU) entitled Looking at Lifestyles. This three-day course is an active, highly participatory study of the geographic, historic and cultural landscapes that shaped the lifestyles of the people of the Northern Plains.  All Teacher Workshops
